thread.title: Hamilton hopeful of closing in on 3rd F1 title at Sochi GP
thread.title_full: Hamilton hopeful of closing in on 3rd F1 title at Sochi GP

author: JAMES ELLINGWORTH
title: Hamilton hopeful of closing in on 3rd F1 title at Sochi GP
text:
Luca Bruno Hamilton hopeful of closing in on 3rd F1 title at Sochi GP 
Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton of Britain talks with a reporter during an interview at the 'Sochi Autodrom' Formula One track , in Sochi, Russia, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. The Formula one race will be held on Sunday. (AP Photo/Luca Bruno) Luca Bruno Hamilton hopeful of closing in on 3rd F1 title at Sochi GP 
Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton of Britain talks with a reporter during an interview at the 'Sochi Autodrom' Formula One track , in Sochi, Russia, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. The Formula one race will be held on Sunday. (AP Photo/Luca Bruno) Posted: Thursday, October 8, 2015 7:20 am Hamilton hopeful of closing in on 3rd F1 title at Sochi GP Associated Press | 
SOCHI, Russia (AP) — As he closes in on his third Formula One drivers' title, Lewis Hamilton is hopeful the conditions in Russia won't work against his Mercedes team. 
Hamilton has a big lead in the standings and was dominant last year in Russia, beating teammate Nico Rosberg to first place in qualifying and the race. However, the Sochi circuit, which winds around venues from last year's Winter Olympics, may not favor Mercedes this time.
